title: Fedwiki Tools
synopsis: Here we list a few tools that are of particular use in managing and creating [[Fedwiki]] content.

title: Gavin Peacock
synopsis: Born in the 1960s in South West London into an "ordinary" working household. Nothing traumatic that I can recall about my childhood, and I left school at 18 after my "A" Levels and fell straight into banking. Deep down, I didn't really have a strong sense of what I wanted to do, and where my brightest "talents" might lie.

title: Outlandish Academy
synopsis: The Outlandish Academy is an open distributed education project for offline and online group work. Our aim is to make online learning more social, personalised, and flexible - [http://outlandish.academy outlandish]

title: Outlandish Activity
synopsis: View all activity of the [[Outlandish Researchers]]  listed in the roster below, writing across education initiatives in the [[Outlandish Academy]]:

title: The Federation
synopsis: Here we describe the The Federation. We should use this term wisely. It describes quite clearly the social aspects of this project, while also pointing gently towards [[Star Trek]] and the future of the [[Decentralised Web]].

title: Welcome to Exponentially Human
synopsis: *[[Pamela McLean]] is responsible for content here*

title: Welcome Visitors
synopsis: Welcome to this [[Federated Wiki]] site initiated by [[Gavin Peacock]]. What is the future of humanity and its most valuable commons - our shared support system that is the precious Earth? How might we, from personal to planetary scale, shift what's possible, shaping new stories for bold, inclusive, creative, abundant futures?

title: X10 Movie
synopsis: The X10 Movie is proposed to be one of the X10 Project "pillars". The aim is to release a feature film in 2018 as one of the "time capsules" of the kinds of changes that will (hopefully!) be celebrated at the Exponentially Human event in September 2027.

title: X10 Project
synopsis: The reason for a working title of X10 Project, which includes the first [[X10 Movie]], [[X10 Experience]] future-making immersive experiences, and more, is because we want to stimulate and gather inspiring responses and involvement for this question and generative challenge:
